summary: Under the Air Force's KC-46 program, Boeing is developing an aerial refueling tanker from a commercial aircraft design. But critical defects with the aircraft's remote vision system and other technologies have delayed full use of these capabilities. The Air Force previously limited its financial risk by using a contract that set a price ceiling with Boeing. But the Air Force now plans to commit to...
title: KC-46 Tanker: Air Force Needs to Mature Critical Technologies in New Aerial Refueling System Design
